title: Using elasticsearch in a Rails application
description: <p>In this tutorial we are going to create a <strong><a href="http://rubyonrails.org/">Ruby on Rails</a></strong> application that will use <strong><a href="https://www.elastic.co/products/elasticsearch">elasticsearch</a></strong> to allow users to store and search their content.The sample application will be a stupid simple blog and the data will be, what else, posts. description: <p>About 5 months ago, I was asked to join a Ruby on Rails project.
